      • hasRole

        public boolean hasRole(String role)
        Checks whether current user has any of roles or not
        Parameters:
        role - (empty if you only need logged in check)
        Returns:
        false if no one is logged in or role is mismatched

      • runPrivileged

        public String runPrivileged(Action action)
        Checks if user is logged in before running the action. Action is run if current session contains logged-in user. Otherwise returns defaultRedirect.
        Parameters:
        action - to be run if user is logged in
        Returns:
        redirect page

      • runPrivileged

        public String runPrivileged(Action action,
                            Roles role)
        Same as runPrivileged, but also checks for the role.
        Parameters:
        action - to be run if user is logged in and has required role
        role - role to check against
        Returns:
        redirect page
